flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=7>>7 more lions each month.
There will be 7*12=<<7*12=84>>84 more lions after 1 year.
There will be 100+84=<<100+84=184>>184 lions in Londolozi after 1 year.
#### 184

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
